title: Syllabus mentioned in ERP
text: Length scales characterizing mesoscopic systems, Quantum de-coherence and entanglement, Quantum scattering, Landauer s Formula, fluctuations and Aharanov-Bohm effect, ballistic electron transport, Coulomb blockade, quantum wires and related phenomena, quantum dots and artificial atoms, anti-dot lattices- classical and quantum chaos, electron-phonon interaction in nanostructures, photonic crystals, quantum dot lasers. Thermodynamic and transport properties in various regimes e.g. ballistic, diffusive and ergodic and statistical modeling of their fluctuations.
